page.title: 12North Newington Village (2)
page.content: The village has only had water on tap and mains electricity for the last 20 years. Some of the people who live in the village do travel a distance to work. The Headteacher of our school lives in this village. It is a very quiet place without much traffic. The village is about {4 miles from Banbury}, the nearest town, and surrounded by lovely countryside. There are still people living in the village who have been there all their lives. If you take a walk up to the allotments on a warm summer day, you are almost certain to meet one of these {old pensioners}. They will happily talk for hours about how life used to be when they were young themselves. Alison Hastie
